statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ -1 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ -2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -10 \\ 9 \\ -2 \\ -1 \\ -9 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ 6 \\ -2 \\ 0 \\ -7 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 1 \\ 3 \\ -1 \\ 3 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
